reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 743: APPLICATION OF SECTION 13 OF THE PUBLIC HOSPITALS ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: APPLICATION OF SECTION 13 OF THE PUBLIC HOSPITALS ACT

content.content: 1. Section 13 of the Public Hospitals Act is applicable to an institution that is designated under section 1 of Regulation 744 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 743, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. Section 13 of the Public Hospitals Act is applicable to an institution that is designated under section 1 of Regulation 744 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 743, s. 1.

Français
